org.apache.polygene.entitystore.geode

Interface GeodeEntityStoreConfiguration


  • public interface GeodeEntityStoreConfiguration
    Geode Configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Property<String> cacheName()
      Geode Cache Name.
      Property<String> cachePropertiesPath()
      Cache properties path, loaded from the classpath.
      Property<String> regionName()
      Geode Region Name.
      Property<String> regionShortcut()
      Cache Region Shortcut.
      Property<GeodeTopology> topology()
      Geode Topology.

    • Method Detail

      • topology

        @UseDefaults
Property<GeodeTopology> topology()
        Geode Topology. Defaults to EMBEDDED, see GeodeTopology.
        Returns:
        Geode Topology

      • cacheName

        @UseDefaults(value="polygene:cache")
Property<String> cacheName()
        Geode Cache Name.
        Returns:
        Geode Cache Name

      • cachePropertiesPath

        @Optional
Property<String> cachePropertiesPath()
        Cache properties path, loaded from the classpath.
        Returns:
        Cache properties path

      • regionShortcut

        @Optional
Property<String> regionShortcut()
        Cache Region Shortcut. In EMBEDDED topology(), defaults to LOCAL, see RegionShortcut. In CLIENT_SERVER topology(), defaults to PROXY, see ClientRegionShortcut.
        Returns:
        Cache Region Shortcut

      • regionName

        @UseDefaults(value="polygene-entitystore-region")
Property<String> regionName()
        Geode Region Name. Region names may only be alphanumeric and may contain hyphens or underscores.
        Returns:
        Geode Region Name
